description: It's got some work to do
Easy to use with game pad
lacking even basic drag and drop, sorting, bookmarking broken. Fedora 36 gnome 42

Its a good looking app but lacks basic features that one would want in a file manager. I couldnt seem to edit the address bar, couldnt access my external drives nor the /media folder to get to them that way for some reason, seemed that there was no settings menu to try and fix anything & that was basically enough for me to say screw it, Ill keep looking. Gave 2 stars for the good looking gui, beats having a file manager that looks like your using the terminal for a file manager.
